emptyState.title: No files found
emptyState.description: This location is empty or no files match your search.

search.filterPlaceholder: Filter files (min 3 chars to server search)…
search.deepSearchActive: Deep search active... scanned {{count}} additional page(s)...
search.clientFiltering: Client-side filtering active. Results may be incomplete. Deep search will auto-trigger if no matches found.

fileDetails.title: File Details: {{fileName}}

tags.noTags: This object has no tags. Add tags below.
tags.savedMessage: Object tags have been updated successfully.

fileDetails.notAvailable: Object metadata and tags are only available for S3 storage locations.

single.title: Upload file
single.dragDropText: Drag and drop a file or upload one

multiple.title: Upload multiple files
multiple.dragDropText: Drag and drop files here or click on the button to select files and folders.

upload.abortErrorMessage: Failed to abort the upload process.

rules.s3Chars: only contain letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), and these special characters: ! . - _ * ' ( ). Spaces are not allowed
rules.localChars: only contain letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), dots (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-). Spaces and special characters are not allowed

folder.title: Delete folder and all its content?
folder.successMessage: Folder "{{folderName}}" and all its contents have been successfully deleted.

selected.title: Delete selected items?
selected.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} item(s)? This action cannot be undone.
selected.confirmCheckbox: I understand this action cannot be undone

huggingface.title: Import a model from Hugging Face
huggingface.helperText: Enter the HuggingFace model repository ID. Model will be imported to the current location.

cleanup.title: Import Cancelled - Cleanup Files?
cleanup.message: The import has been cancelled. The following files were downloaded:
cleanup.keepOrDelete: Do you want to keep these files or delete them?

locationUnavailable.title: Location Unavailable
locationUnavailable.message: The storage location "{{name}}" is currently unavailable.
locationUnavailable.localMessage: The directory may be inaccessible or the path may be incorrect.
locationUnavailable.disabledMessage: File operations are disabled until the location becomes available.

noLocations.title: No storage locations available
noLocations.message: All storage sources failed to load. Check S3 and local storage configuration.

fileViewer.title: File Preview
fileViewer.errorMessage: Failed to retrieve the file content.
fileViewer.errorObjectMessage: Failed to retrieve the object content.

emptyState.folderEmptyDescription: Upload files or create folders to get started.
emptyState.noSearchResultsDescription: No files or folders found matching "{{searchText}}".

notes.fileViewerLimit: File viewer is only enabled for files smaller than 1MB and supported types.
notes.lastItemDeletesFolder: Deleting the last item in a folder will delete the folder.
notes.largeDownloadWarning: Download of large files may fail.

defaultSettings.title: Using Default Settings
defaultSettings.maxConcurrentTransfers: Failed to fetch max concurrent transfers setting. Using default value (2).
defaultSettings.maxFilesPerPage: Failed to fetch max files per page setting. Using default value (100).

locationUnavailable.title: Location Unavailable
locationUnavailable.message: Storage location "{{name}}" is currently unavailable. It may be disconnected or inaccessible.
locationUnavailable.cannotSelect: Cannot select "{{name}}" as it is currently unavailable.

pathCopied.title: Path copied
pathCopied.message: The path has been successfully copied to the clipboard.

errorLoadingFiles.title: Error Loading Files
errorLoadingFiles.message: Failed to load files from storage.

noLocations.title: No storage locations available
noLocations.message: All storage sources failed to load. Check S3 and local storage configuration. See browser console for details.

errorLoadingLocations.title: Error Loading Locations
errorLoadingLocations.message: Failed to load storage locations. Please check your connection settings.

deleteFailed.title: Delete Failed
deleteFailed.message: Failed to delete some items. Please try again.

downloadFailed.title: Download Failed
downloadFailed.message: Failed to download the file. Please try again.

modelImport.noLocations: Cannot import model - no storage destinations available.

connectionError.title: Connection error
connectionError.message: Failed to establish import progress connection
connectionError.lost: Lost connection to import progress stream. Please check the transfer queue for status.

filesDeleted.message: All downloaded files have been deleted.
